extensions.{9c21158b-2c76-4d0a-980a-c51f.message: Allows you to specify seperate new mail alerts on a folder-by-folder basis

mailboxalert.alert_deleted.message: Unable to set alert, the alert has been removed

mailboxalert.alert_prefs.custom_position.message: Drag this window to where you want the alert to appear
And click the button that corresponds to the corner
where you want the alert to appear

mailboxalert.alert_prefs.onclick.openmai.message: Open the message in a new window

mailboxalert.alert_prefs.onclick.selectm.message: Open the message in the current window

mailboxalert.alert_settings.alertset.message: This alert is set to one or more folders. Are you sure you want to delete it?

mailboxalert.alert_settings.alertsetforf.message: This alert is set to one or more filters. Are you sure you want to delete it?

mailboxalert.error.badcommandpath1.message: The command to execute for mail folder

mailboxalert.error.badcommandpath2.message: contains an erronneous pathname to the executable. Always use the full path to the executable. If it contains spaces, you must place a backslash (\) character in front of each space, putting quotes around the path does not work.

mailboxalert.menu.alertforchildren.message: Alert for child folders (if they have no alerts themselves)

mailboxalert.menu.noalerttoparent.message: Don't let parent folders alert for this one

mailboxalert.prefs.escapehtml.message: Use HTML codes for special characters in macros

mailboxalert.prefs.escapewindowsquotes.message: Escape double quotes with another double quote (for windows cmd.exe)

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.charset.message: The character set of the folder

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.date.message: The date the message was sent

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.enter.message: Line break (does not work in the first field of 'show a message')

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.escape.message: If any file or argument contains spaces, be sure to escape them with

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.foldername.message: The name of the mail folder

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.macros.message: You can use the following macros

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.messagebytes.message: The size of the message in bytes

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.messagesize.message: The size of the message in human readable form (for instance 2.1M)

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.msg_body.message: A text view of the message body

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.msg_preview.message: A short preview of the message content

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.msg_uri.message: The full URI of the message

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.numunread.message: The number of unread messages in this folder

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.originalfolder.message: The name of the subfolder that received the message

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.sender.message: The sender of the last unread message

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.senderaddress.message: The address part of the sender of the last unread message (between '<' and '>')

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.sendername.message: The part of the sender of the last unread message up to the first '<' in it

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.subject.message: The subject of the last unread message

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.time.message: The time the message was sent

mailboxalert.prefs.expl.totalunread.message: The number of unread messages in this folder and all of its subfolders
